title: Surveys
createFirstSurvey: Create your first survey for this project
selectLanguage: Select the language for this survey
languageWillAffect: The selected language will affect how the survey is displayed

targeting.title: Targeting
targeting.delayDescription: Wait time after page load (0 = immediate)
targeting.defaultBehaviorDescription: By default, the survey does not appear in any URL. You need to add the specific URLs where you want the survey to be triggered.
targeting.alwaysRecurrence: The survey will be displayed every time it is triggered, ignoring previous response history.
targeting.allPagesDisplay: Survey will be displayed on all pages

unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Remember to save before leaving.
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this survey?
clickToAdd: Click on an element type to start
noElementsInSurvey: No elements added to the survey yet.
selectOption: Please select an option before continuing
selectRating: Please select a rating before continuing
canMakeQuestions: Can we ask you some quick questions?
confirming: Please confirm you want to delete this element

embed.title: Embed Code
embed.pasteInGTM: Paste this code in a custom HTML tag in GTM
embed.gtmStep2: Create a new tag of type "Custom HTML"
embed.gtmStep3: Paste the code above in the HTML field
embed.htmlDescription: Add this code directly to your site's HTML
embed.htmlStep1: Paste the code before the closing </body> tag
embed.jsDescription: JavaScript code with advanced control and error handling
embed.eventDescription: For surveys configured with event triggering, use this JavaScript function
embed.eventStep1: Configure the survey with "Trigger: Event" and "Recurrence: Always"
embed.eventStep2: Load the survey script on the page (using one of the other tabs)
embed.eventStep4: Pass custom parameters for later analysis
embed.eventStep5: Ideal for: order completion, specific actions, A/B experiments
embed.useCase2: SaaS: After completing onboarding, measure satisfaction
embed.useCase3: Fake Door: Test interest in new feature
embed.useCase4: Experiments: Collect feedback at specific points

confirmDeleteSurvey: Are you sure you want to delete this survey? This action cannot be undone.
